recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil
Cook spaghetti according to package instructions
Meanwhile, cut guanciale into small cubes
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated cheeses, and black pepper
Cook guanciale in a large pan until crispy
Add cooked pasta to the pan with guanciale
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and half the tikka paste for 30 minutes
Grill or bake chicken until cooked through
Sauté chopped onion, garlic, and ginger
Add remaining tikka paste and tomato paste
Add coconut milk and simmer
Add cooked chicken and simmer for 10 minutes
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce
Make caesar dressing with lemon, garlic, and anchovies
Toss lettuce with dressing
Add croutons and parmesan cheese
Season with salt and pepper
Serve immediately

recipes.name: Beef Stir Fry
instructions: Slice beef into thin strips
Chop vegetables into bite-sized pieces
Heat oil in a wok or large pan
Stir-fry beef until browned, remove from pan
Stir-fry vegetables until crisp-tender
Add beef back to pan with sauces
Cook for 2-3 minutes until sauce thickens
Serve over rice

recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
instructions: Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C)
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface
Spread tomato sauce evenly
Add torn mozzarella cheese
Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden
Add fresh basil leaves
Drizzle with olive oil and serve
